function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased airflow speed in pipes due to toilet flushing transmitting COVID-19 between apartments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission between different residential units","Mitigation":"Install air pressure regulators to control the airflow speed in pipes","Technologies":"Air pressure regulators, airflow sensors","People":"Residents of the building","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 through air conditioning systems with centrally distributed air ducts","Impact":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 within building zones through air conditioning systems","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of air ducts, installation of high-efficiency air filters","Technologies":"Disinfection systems, high-efficiency air filters","People":"Building maintenance staff, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Presence of COVID-19 in centrally conditioned hospital air ducts","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare facility-acquired COVID-19 infections","Mitigation":"Frequent cleaning and disinfection of hospital air ducts, implementation of air purification systems","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV-C sterilization","People":"Hospital staff, patients","Owner":"Hospital administration"}]}
